item.title: Getting Started with OpenAI Codex CLI
item.description:
I’ve been playing with the recently announced OpenAI Codex CLI.

What is OpenAI Codex CLI? #

OpenAI Codex CLI is available on GitHub. It’s a lightweight AI coding assistant that runs directly in the terminal, like Claude Code from Anthropic.

Features include:

  • Read, modify, and run code
  • Multimodal input for processing screenshots and diagrams
  • Different approval levels

While it’s still labeled as experimental, OpenAI is actively seeking community contributions. They’re even offering a $1 million initiative supporting open-source projects that use Codex CLI, with grants in $25,000 API credit increments.
